description: The lady fern (Athyrium filix-femina 'Fancy Fronds') is a truly remarkable plant species beloved for its soft, lacy fronds. This small and delicate looking fern can bring a touch of class and enchantment to any indoor or outdoor garden, with its lightly ruffled feather like foliage adding a tranquil touch to your space. Easy to care for and tolerant of shady spots, these ferns make an elegant addition to your garden, providing an attractive and low-maintenance addition to any area. Sweeping and billowing with graceful beauty, the lady fern deserves a place in your garden.
